description: Interactive single-page web application displaying ocean research organizations on a world map. Features a split layout with search panel (30% width) and Mapbox interactive map (70% width). Loads data from CSV, displays markers for organizations, and provides search functionality with detailed popups.

file_descriptions.package.json: NPM configuration with dependencies: react, react-dom, typescript, vite, tailwindcss, postcss, autoprefixer, mapbox-gl, papaparse for CSV parsing, and @types packages
file_descriptions.tsconfig.json: TypeScript configuration for React with strict mode, DOM types, and ES2020 target
file_descriptions.vite.config.ts: Vite configuration with React plugin and environment variable handling
file_descriptions.tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration with content paths for React components
file_descriptions.postcss.config.js: PostCSS configuration for TailwindCSS and autoprefixer
file_descriptions.index.html: HTML entry point with root div, Mapbox GL CSS import, and meta tags for responsive design
file_descriptions..gitignore: Git ignore file for node_modules, dist, .env, .DS_Store, and build artifacts
file_descriptions..env.example: Environment variable template with VITE_MAPBOX_TOKEN placeholder
file_descriptions.src/utils/types.ts: TypeScript interfaces for Organization data, search state, map bounds, and component props
file_descriptions.src/utils/constants.ts: Application constants including CSV URL, map initial settings, and styling values
file_descriptions.src/utils/csvParser.ts: CSV parsing utilities with coordinate validation, null handling, and data transformation
file_descriptions.src/utils/mapUtils.ts: Map utility functions for coordinate validation, bounds calculation, and marker creation
file_descriptions.src/components/OrganizationPopup.tsx: Popup component content for displaying organization details in Mapbox popup
file_descriptions.src/components/OrganizationCard.tsx: Card component for displaying organization in search results with click handler
file_descriptions.src/components/SearchPanel.tsx: Left panel component with search input and results list, handles filtering and selection
file_descriptions.src/components/MapView.tsx: Main map component using Mapbox GL JS with markers, popups, and zoom functionality
file_descriptions.src/index.css: Global styles with Tailwind directives and custom CSS for map container and components
file_descriptions.src/main.tsx: React entry point rendering App component with StrictMode
file_descriptions.src/App.tsx: Main application component with split layout, state management, and component coordination

components.MapView: export interface MapViewProps { organizations: Organization[]; selectedOrganization: Organization | null; onMarkerClick: (org: Organization) => void; }
components.SearchPanel: export interface SearchPanelProps { organizations: Organization[]; onOrganizationSelect: (org: Organization) => void; }
components.OrganizationCard: export interface OrganizationCardProps { organization: Organization; onClick: (org: Organization) => void; }

src/components/MapView.tsx.description: Interactive Mapbox map component with organization markers, popups, and zoom functionality. Uses colorful map style and world view initial position.

src/components/SearchPanel.tsx.description: Left panel with search input and filtered results list. Handles null-safe text filtering across all organization fields.

src/components/OrganizationCard.tsx.description: Card component for search results with black horizontal bar, bold uppercase title, and organization details

src/components/OrganizationPopup.tsx.description: Popup content component for displaying organization details in Mapbox popup with formatted layout

src/App.tsx.description: Main app component with CSS Grid layout, CSV data loading, and state management for organization selection
